articles.title: The Covid-19 case surge is altering daily life across the US. Things will likely get worse, experts warn - CNN
articles.description: The US is ringing in the new year amid a Covid-19 surge that experts warn is exploding at unprecedented speed and could alter daily life for many Americans during the first month of 2022.
